name: Custom Crafting Commission
description: Commission a custom item, such as a weapon, tool, garment, or other crafted good tailored to your specifications.

name: Repair Services
description: Skilled artisans will repair damaged tools, weapons, armor, or other equipment.

name: Tool Sharpening & Maintenance
description: Maintain and sharpen tools or blades to ensure peak performance.

name: Apprenticeship Placement
description: Find placement for a young apprentice under a guildmaster's tutelage.

name: Design Consultation
description: Receive expert advice on item designs or modifications before construction begins.

name: Material Appraisal
description: Have materials examined for value, quality, and utility in crafting.

name: Guild Certification
description: Obtain official certification to practice as a recognized craftsman within guild jurisdictions.

name: Special Materials Procurement
description: Request the guild to locate or import rare or exotic materials for specialty projects.

name: Commission Stamped Goods
description: Order goods bearing the official mark of the guild, ensuring recognized quality and resale value.

name: Experimental Reagent Trials
description: Participate in or sponsor trials for new alchemical compounds under guild supervision.
price: 10 gp for trial participation, 50+ gp for sponsorship

name: Enchanted Map Commission
description: Have a map created that reveals magical ley lines, hidden terrain, or shifting landmarks.
price: 100 gp and up, varies by complexity

name: Personal Sigil Design
description: Custom sigils or insignias crafted for noble houses, guilds, or individuals.
price: 15 gp for standard, 50+ gp for magical
